name: Jungle Potion
Start point: Trufitus Shakaya in Tai Bwo Wannai Village
Description: Collect 5 rare herbs for Trufitus to create a communion potion with the gods of Karamja.

substeps: Talk to Trufitus Shakaya in Tai Bwo Wannai Village
Snake Weed: Search marshy vines SW of village
Ardrigal: Search palm trees NE coastal area
Sito Foil: Scorched earth near perpetual fire
Volencia Moss: Rocks SE coastal area
Rogues' Purse: Karamja dungeon fungal wall (past Jogres)
Receive Herblore XP and quest completion
